notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Ibikorwa vyawe bizohindurwa kugira ntibimenyekane mu misi 7 kubera
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: Ibikorwa vyawe vyose muri uyu muryango bizohindurwa kugira ntibimenyekane kandi bishirwe mu bubiko mu misi 7, inyuma y'aho ntuzoshobora kubisiba canke kubihindura. Raba ibikorwa vyawe munsi.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: Ibikorwa vyawe vyose muri uyu mugwi bizohindurwa kugira ntibimenyekane kandi bishirwe mu bubiko mu misi 7, inyuma y'aho ntuzoshobora kubisiba canke kubihindura. Raba ibikorwa vyawe munsi.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Kanda ku buhinga bw'umuryango uri munsi, injira nk'umuyobozi hanyuma uhitamwo Ubuyobozi bwa Fraude mu menyu.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Igitigiri c'ibikorwa bishobora kuba ari uburiganya n'akanovera ka 75% ko ari uburiganya
email.possibleFraudInformation: Ubwoko bwacu bwikora bwamenye ibikorwa bishobora kuba ari uburiganya. Ushobora kuraba neza biciye mu buyobozi bw'umuryango. Bimwe muri ivyo bikorwa bishobora kuba bifise impamvu zitari uburiganya, nico gituma ukwiye kwitondera itohoza imbere yo gusiba ibikorwa.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Iki gikorwa cahagaritswe kubera ko cakoreshejwe n'imashini zikoresheje AI mu kumenya ubukazi bw'ibikorwa. Ushobora gusiba iki gikorwa uko bikwiye.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: Algorithme ya AI yahagaritse bimwe mu bishushanyo bifitaniye isano n'iki gikorwa. Iyo algorithme irasuzuma amashusho kugira ngo imenye niba harimo amashusho y'abantu bakuru, urugomo, ibijanye n'ubuvuzi, n'ibishushanyo biteye isoni. Ushobora gusiba iki gikorwa uko bikwiye.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Rimwe na rimwe aligoritimu ya AI iraharura amanota atari yo, muri ico gihe ntugire ikibazo, nta kindi gikorwa usabwa gukora kandi ushobora kwirengagiza ubu butumwa.
email.automaticToxicityEnglishText: Ijambo ry'icongereza ryakoreshejwe kugira ngo ritange amanota
email.user_invite_2: Kanda ku ruhushya canke ushire mu kibanza c'aderece ya porogaramu kugira wemere ubutumire
email.pointUnhelpfulSelf: Iciyumviro catanzwe ko kidafashije ku gitekerezo canje
email.pointHelpfulSelf: Iciyumviro catanzwe ko gifashije ku gitekerezo canje
email.reset_password_1: Ng'aha hano uruzitiro rwo guhindura ijambo ry'ibanga.
email.reset_password_3: Ijambo ry'ibanga ryawe ntirizohinduka gushika uginze uwo murongo uri hejuru maze ukore irindi.
